item.name: Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.backend_busy (backend connections too many / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.backend_conn (backend connections successfully stablished / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.backend_unhealthy (backend connections not attempted / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.bans_lurker_obj_killed (objects killed by bans lurker / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.bans_obj_killed (objects killed by bans during lookup / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.busy_killed (requests killed after sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.busy_sleep (requests sent to sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.busy_wakeup (requests woken after sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.cache_hitpass (cache hits for pass / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.client_req (good -parseable- client requests received / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.client_req_400 (client requests received, subject to 400 errors / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.client_req_417 (client requests received, subject to 417 errors / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_1xx (beresps with no body because of 1xx responses / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_204 (beresps with no body because of 204 responses / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_304 (beresps with not body because of 304 responses / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_bad (bad fetches because beresp.body length/fetch could not be determined / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_chunked (beresps with body chunked / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_eof (beresps with body EOF / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_head (beresps with not body because of HEAD requests / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_length (beresps with body Content-Length / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_none (beresps with no body / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.fetch_no_thread (failed fetches because no thread available / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.sess_closed_err (sessions closed with error / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.sess_drop (sessions dropped due to lack of worker thread / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.sess_dropped (sessions dropped because the queue was too long / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.sess_fail (sessions TCP accept failures / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.sess_queued (sessions queued waiting for a thread / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.s_pipe_hdrbytes (pipe request header bytes / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.s_pipe_in (piped bytes from client / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.s_pipe_out (piped bytes to client / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.threads (number of threads in all pools)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.threads_created (threads created in all pools / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.threads_destroyed (threads destroyed in all pools / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.threads_limited (times more threads were needed but limit was reached in a thread pool / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - MAIN.thread_queue_len (length of session queue waiting for threads)

item_prototype.name: Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - VBE.{#ID}.pipe_hdrbytes (pipe request header bytes / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - VBE.{#ID}.pipe_in (piped bytes from backend / sec)
Varnish[{$VARNISH_NAME}] - VBE.{#ID}.pipe_out (piped bytes to backend / sec)
